resources.string: This is the debug screen. However this text will dissapear when data arrives from the server.

--- NEW FEATURES
*bell character options
*fullscreen mode toggle
*local echo toggle
*launcher improvements
*selectable encoding
*pipe to/popup keyboard command

--- BUG FIXES
*aliases match on word boundaries
*keep screen awake is now optional
*rapid button press causing freeze
*minor ui issues
*better ansi color parsing
